ygData.subject: Re: negativity
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No, thats partially my fault.  I started off on the wrong foot today, and got a little carried away.  I want to make this game the best it can be, and
ygData.messageBody:
> Just one point to make here. I've been following this list since June or
> so, and most of what I've read from Kim and Ryan has been useful
> discussion, analysis, and tips on how to play the bard. In fact, they
> are probably 2 of the more prolific posters to the list and I usually
> find the threads they post in to be very interesting. However, the only
> posts I can recall reading from the recent complainers about their
> latest postings are, the complaints.

No, thats partially my fault. I started off on the wrong foot
today, and got a little carried away. I want to make this game
the best it can be, and that's my bottom line.

Sorry bards =D (and Ariell, you know why, sorry man ;)

Harmonic.
